Player History
Drafted in 8th round, 213rd overall pick, by New York (N) in 2012...
Traded from New York (N) to Washington on 4/1/2016 (Going to NYN: SS J. Giavotella. Going to WSH: 2B C. Colon, SS J. Ortiz)...
Released by Washington on 8/8/2016...
Signed as a free agent by Milwaukee on 8/8/2016 to a minor league deal...
Had first career hit on 4/10/2019, off Philip Humber (CIN)...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Houston on 5/5/2019...
Hit first career homerun on 5/11/2019, off Albert Cruz (CHN)...
Injured on 8/3/2022 with a Fractured Wrist, out for 6 weeks...
Traded from Milwaukee to Toronto on 2/20/2023 (Going to TOR: SS J. Ortiz. Going to MIL: P K. Dellinger)...
Injured on 5/24/2023 with a Broken Nose, out for 1-2 weeks...
